title: Best of The Herd: 09/30/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/30/2019
description:
Colin says you have to have realistic expectations for Dak Prescott and if you are waiting for him to make extraordinary game winning plays then you'll be waiting a long time. He thinks the Browns found a winning formula and its to run the ball and don't ask Baker Mayfield to do too much. Colin admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, former Browns and Jets Head Coahc Eric Mangini explains why the patriots defense is so dominant and why the Cowboys aren't as good as we think.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
